      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage(ImageTTAA img,
                              ImageWrite.SupportedImageFileExtension ext,
                              java.lang.String filenameWithoutExt)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an image with the specified extension type with the specified file name.
        Parameters:
        img - image to write
        ext - extension (format) to use
        filenameWithoutExt - extensionless filename
        Throws:
        IOException, - if a problem occurs
        java.io.IOException

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage(ImageTTAA img,
                              java.lang.String filename)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an image to the specified file name. Attempts to infer the extension format to use based on the file name given. If inference fails, it implodes. If no extension is given, the default file extension is used.
        Parameters:
        img -
        filename -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        imgs -
        filename -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
